title: Ao (Overgod)
body:
Ao is the enigmatic **Overgod** who stands above all deities of the Realms.
- Oversees cosmic balance.
- Does not grant spells.
- Enforces rules among gods.

title: Azuth (God)
body:
Azuth, the **High One**, patron of wizards and arcane mastery.
- Guides responsible magic use.
- Ally of Mystra.

title: Bane (God)
body:
Bane, the **Black Hand**, god of tyranny and fear.
- Patron of conquerors and despots.
- Seeks absolute domination.

title: Beshaba (God)
body:
Beshaba, **Lady of Misfortune**, spreads bad luck and accidents.
- Feared at festivals and births.
- Twin/rival of Tymora.

title: Chauntea (God)
body:
Chauntea, the **Great Mother**, governs agriculture and life.
- Patron of farmers.
- Symbol of renewal.

title: Cyric (God)
body:
Cyric, the **Prince of Lies**, god of murder, lies, and strife.
- Sows chaos and betrayal.
- Enemy of nearly all other gods.

title: Deneir (God)
body:
Deneir, the **Lord of All Glyphs & Images**, god of writing and literacy.
- Patron of scribes and cartographers.
- Seeks to record all knowledge.

title: Eldath (God)
body:
Eldath, the **Quiet One**, goddess of peace and still waters.
- Patron of pacifists and sacred groves.
- Opposes needless bloodshed.

title: Gargauth (Demigod)
body:
Gargauth, the **Hidden Lord**, corrupted demigod of treachery and corruption.
- Seduces cities into tyranny.
- Often bound in cursed artifacts.

title: Ghaunadaur (God)
body:
Ghaunadaur, **That Which Lurks**, patron of oozes and outcasts among drow.
- Hungers for dissolution.
- Alien devotion.

title: Gond (God)
body:
Gond, the **Wonderbringer**, god of craft and invention.
- Patron of artisans and tinkerers.
- Encourages innovation and devices.

title: Helm (God)
body:
Helm, the **Vigilant One**, god of guardians and protection.
- Patron of sentinels and watchmen.
- Embodies duty and vigilance.

title: Hoar (God)
body:
Hoar, the **Doombringer**, god of poetic justice and vengeance.
- Patron of duels and retribution.
- Balances grievance and punishment.

title: Ilmater (God)
body:
Ilmater, the **Crying God**, patron of endurance and compassion.
- Comforts the suffering.
- Encourages mercy and sacrifice.

title: Jergal (God)
body:
Jergal, the **Scribe of the Doomed**, keeps the records of the dead.
- Servant-ally of Kelemvor.
- Detached, meticulous chronicler.

title: Kelemvor (God)
body:
Kelemvor, the **Lord of the Dead**, judges mortal souls.
- Patron of funerary rites.
- Upholds fairness in death.

title: Lathander (God)
body:
Lathander, the **Morninglord**, god of dawn and renewal.
- Patron of creativity and births.
- Symbol of new beginnings.

title: Leira (God)
body:
Leira, **Lady of the Mists**, goddess of illusion and mystery.
- Patron of secrets and misdirection.
- Elusive and unpredictable.

title: Lliira (God)
body:
Lliira, **Lady of Joy**, goddess of festivals and celebration.
- Patron of dancers and revels.
- Opposes tyranny and sorrow.

title: Loviatar (God)
body:
Loviatar, the **Maiden of Pain**, revels in agony and discipline.
- Patron of torturers and flagellants.
- Teaches strength through suffering.

title: Malar (God)
body:
Malar, the **Beastlord**, god of the savage hunt.
- Patron of predators and bloodsport.
- Thrives on the kill.

title: Mask (God)
body:
Mask, the **Lord of Shadows**, patron of thieves.
- Embodies stealth and secrecy.
- Fickle ally, elusive foe.

title: Milil (God)
body:
Milil, the **Lord of Song**, patron of poetry and music.
- Inspires bards and artists.
- Celebrates beauty of performance.

title: Myrkul (God)
body:
Myrkul, the **Lord of Bones**, ancient god of death and memory of the dead.
- Haunts tombs and catacombs.
- Fearful whisper in the dark.

title: Mystra (God)
body:
Mystra, the **Lady of Mysteries**, goddess of magic and the Weave.
- Patron of spellcasters.
- Embodies arcane balance.

title: Oghma (God)
body:
Oghma, the **Binder of What is Known**, god of knowledge and inspiration.
- Patron of sages and inventors.
- Seeks to spread ideas.

title: Red Knight (Demigod)
body:
The Red Knight, **Lady of Strategy**, patron of tactics and planning.
- Advisor to Tempus.
- Values discipline and foresight.

title: Savras (God)
body:
Savras, **All-Seeing**, god of divination and fate.
- Patron of oracles and auguries.
- Veils parted.

title: Selûne (God)
body:
Selûne, the **Moonmaiden**, goddess of the moon and navigation.
- Patron of wanderers and sailors.
- Eternal rival of Shar.

title: Shar (God)
body:
Shar, the **Mistress of the Night**, embodies loss and secrets.
- Keeper of hidden knowledge.
- Opposes Selûne.

title: Shaundakul (God)
body:
Shaundakul, **Rider of the Winds**, god of exploration and portals.
- Patron of travelers and traders.
- Embraces new horizons.

title: Silvanus (God)
body:
Silvanus, the **Oak Father**, god of the wilds and natural balance.
- Patron of druids.
- Balance of growth and decay.

title: Sune (God)
body:
Sune, the **Lady of Love**, goddess of beauty and passion.
- Patron of artists and lovers.
- Celebrates romance and art.

title: Talona (God)
body:
Talona, **Lady of Poison**, spreads disease and venom.
- Patron of assassins and apothecaries.
- Feared in cities and wilds.

title: Talos (God)
body:
Talos, the **Stormlord**, god of storms and destruction.
- Patron of raiders and tempests.
- Wreaks havoc upon coasts.

title: Tempus (God)
body:
Tempus, the **Lord of Battles**, governs war and combat.
- Patron of soldiers and generals.
- Honors valor over victory.

title: Torm (God)
body:
Torm, the **Loyal Fury**, god of duty and righteousness.
- Patron of paladins.
- Selfless courage and service.

title: Tymora (God)
body:
Tymora, **Lady Luck**, goddess of good fortune.
- Patron of adventurers and gamblers.
- Twin/rival of Beshaba.

title: Tyr (God)
body:
Tyr, the **Maimed God**, embodies justice and law.
- Patron of judges and rulers.
- Sacrificed his hand to duty.

title: Umberlee (God)
body:
Umberlee, the **Bitch Queen**, goddess of the sea and shipwrecks.
- Patron (and terror) of sailors.
- Demands offerings for safe passage.

title: Waukeen (God)
body:
Waukeen, the **Merchant's Friend**, goddess of trade and wealth.
- Patron of markets and coin.
- Encourages enterprise.

title: Akadi (God)
body:
Akadi, **Queen of Air**, elemental deity of freedom and movement.
- Patron of fliers and free spirits.
- Ever-changing winds.

title: Grumbar (God)
body:
Grumbar, **King of Earth**, elemental stability and endurance.
- Patron of miners and delvers.
- Unyielding bedrock.

title: Istishia (God)
body:
Istishia, **Prince of Water**, elemental change and cycles.
- Patron of swimmers and sailors.
- Tides and currents eternal.

title: Kossuth (God)
body:
Kossuth, **Lord of Flames**, elemental fire and purification.
- Patron of firewalkers and forges.
- Trial by flame.

title: Uthgar (God)
body:
Uthgar, **Father of the Uthgardt**, ancestor god of totem tribes.
- Patron of clan totems and rites.
- Strength through trials.

title: Valkur (God)
body:
Valkur, **The Mighty**, patron of sailors' luck and fair winds.
- Opposes Umberlee's cruelty.
- Adventurous, bold spirit.

title: Finder Wyvernspur (Demigod)
body:
Finder Wyvernspur, **Nameless Bard Ascendant**, demipower of invention in art.
- Patron of experimental artists.
- Reinvention and renewal.

title: Moradin (God)
body:
Moradin, the **Soul Forger**, chief dwarf god of craft and creation.
- Patron of smiths and clan founders.
- Upholds tradition and toil.

title: Berronar Truesilver (God)
body:
Berronar Truesilver, **Mother of Safety**, hearth and marriage.
- Patron of healers and keepers.
- Oaths and family.

title: Clangeddin Silverbeard (God)
body:
Clangeddin Silverbeard, **Father of Battle**, dwarven valor.
- Patron of warriors.
- Glory through honorable combat.

title: Dugmaren Brightmantle (God)
body:
Dugmaren Brightmantle, **Wanderer of Wonder**, curiosity and discovery.
- Patron of scholars and explorers.
- Open-minded learning.

title: Dumathoin (God)
body:
Dumathoin, **Keeper of Secrets Under the Mountain**, mines and buried lore.
- Patron of miners and gemcutters.
- Silent guardian of the deep.

title: Gorm Gulthyn (God)
body:
Gorm Gulthyn, **Fire Eyes**, vigilant defense of dwarven holds.
- Patron of sentries.
- Eternal watch.

title: Haela Brightaxe (God)
body:
Haela Brightaxe, **Lady of the Fray**, luck in battle.
- Patron of bold strikes.
- Joy in combat.

title: Marthammor Duin (God)
body:
Marthammor Duin, **The Finder of Trails**, travelers and scouts.
- Patron of pathfinders.
- Bridges dwarf and surface.

title: Sharindlar (God)
body:
Sharindlar, **Lady of Life and Mercy**, healing and romance.
- Patron of midwives and dancers.
- Festivals of renewal.

title: Thard Harr (God)
body:
Thard Harr, **Jungle Lord**, wild dwarves and hunts.
- Patron of Chult dwarves.
- Primal rites.

title: Vergadain (God)
body:
Vergadain, **Merchant King**, wealth and cunning deals.
- Patron of traders and rogues.
- Golden opportunity.

title: Corellon Larethian (God)
body:
Corellon Larethian, **First of the Seldarine**, art, magic, and warfare.
- Patron of elves and creators.
- Grace and change.

title: Sehanine Moonbow (God)
body:
Sehanine Moonbow, **Lunar Lady**, dreams and mysteries.
- Patron of transitions and journeys.
- Moonlit secrets.

title: Aerdrie Faenya (God)
body:
Aerdrie Faenya, **Lady of the Winds**, aerial freedom.
- Patron of fliers and sky elves.
- Storm-kissed joy.

title: Angharradh (God)
body:
Angharradh, **Triune Queen**, aspect of elven unity.
- Patron of resilience.
- Triple-aspected goddess.

title: Hanali Celanil (God)
body:
Hanali Celanil, **Heart of Gold**, elven love and beauty.
- Patron of romance and art.
- Rosy delight.

title: Labelas Enoreth (God)
body:
Labelas Enoreth, **The Lifegiver**, time, history, and wisdom.
- Patron of longevity and lore.
- Perspective of ages.

title: Rillifane Rallathil (God)
body:
Rillifane Rallathil, **Leaflord**, forests and renewal.
- Patron of treefolk and druids.
- Canopy's shelter.

title: Solonor Thelandira (God)
body:
Solonor Thelandira, **Keen Eye**, archery and the hunt.
- Patron of rangers.
- Silent arrow.

title: Deep Sashelas (God)
body:
Deep Sashelas, **Sea Father**, sea elves and oceans.
- Patron of reef craft and song.
- Tides of life.

title: Fenmarel Mestarine (God)
body:
Fenmarel Mestarine, **Lone Wolf**, outcast elves.
- Patron of the forgotten.
- Solitude as shield.

title: Erevan Ilesere (God)
body:
Erevan Ilesere, **The Trickster**, mischief and change.
- Patron of pranksters.
- Coin of chance.

title: Shevarash (God)
body:
Shevarash, **Black Archer**, vengeance against drow.
- Patron of oathbound archers.
- Grudges in shadow.

title: Vandria Gilmadrith (God)
body:
Vandria Gilmadrith, **War Matron**, discipline and resolve.
- Patron of strategists.
- Somber duty.

title: Lolth (God)
body:
Lolth, the **Queen of Spiders**, ruthless patron of the drow.
- Chaos, cruelty, and webs of power.
- Demands absolute obedience.

title: Vhaeraun (God)
body:
Vhaeraun, **Mask of the Drow**, thievery and rebellion.
- Patron of surface-returning drow.
- Rival to Lolth.

title: Eilistraee (God)
body:
Eilistraee, **Dark Dancer**, redemption for the drow.
- Patron of song and the moonlit road.
- Hope against Lolth's tyranny.

title: Kiaransalee (God)
body:
Kiaransalee, **Lady of the Dead**, undeath and revenge.
- Patron of necromancy.
- Names whispered in hate.

title: Selvetarm (God)
body:
Selvetarm, **Champion of Lolth**, embattled drow war-god.
- Patron of endless conflict.
- Consumed by rage.

title: Yondalla (God)
body:
Yondalla, **The Protector and Provider**, chief halfling goddess.
- Patron of families and plenty.
- Round-hearted wisdom.

title: Arvoreen (God)
body:
Arvoreen, **The Defender**, vigilance and readiness.
- Patron of shires' militias.
- Shields high.

title: Cyrrollalee (God)
body:
Cyrrollalee, **Heart of the Hearth**, hospitality and trust.
- Patron of hosts.
- Welcome and warmth.

title: Sheela Peryroyl (God)
body:
Sheela Peryroyl, **Green Sister**, crops and gardens.
- Patron of planters and cooks.
- Harmony with the land.

title: Brandobaris (God)
body:
Brandobaris, **Master of Stealth**, luck and adventure.
- Patron of wanderers and rogues.
- Quick fingers, quicker feet.

title: Urogalan (God)
body:
Urogalan, **The Black Hound**, halfling dead and earth.
- Patron of burial customs.
- Quiet remembrance.

title: Garl Glittergold (God)
body:
Garl Glittergold, **Joker of Gems**, chief gnome deity.
- Patron of humor and wisdom.
- Pranks with purpose.

title: Baervan Wildwanderer (God)
body:
Baervan Wildwanderer, **Forest Friend**, wanderlust and beasts.
- Patron of scouts.
- Companionship of Chiktikka Fastpaws.

title: Baravar Cloakshadow (God)
body:
Baravar Cloakshadow, **Hidden Master**, illusions and wards.
- Patron of clever defenses.
- Subtlety over force.

title: Flandal Steelskin (God)
body:
Flandal Steelskin, **Master of Metal**, smithing and fire.
- Patron of smiths and miners.
- Tempered resilience.

title: Gaerdal Ironhand (God)
body:
Gaerdal Ironhand, **Stern Watcher**, vigilance and drill.
- Patron of shield patrols.
- Duty before mirth.

title: Segojan Earthcaller (God)
body:
Segojan Earthcaller, **Digger of Roots**, burrows and earth's bounty.
- Patron of rock gnomes.
- Whisper of stone.

title: Urdlen (God)
body:
Urdlen, **The Crawler Below**, gnome bogey-deity of mindless ruin.
- Patron of burrowing dread.
- Pale, endless hunger.

title: Gruumsh (God)
body:
Gruumsh, **One-Eye**, chief orc god of conquest.
- Patron of warbands.
- Eternal hatred of elves.

title: Bahgtru (God)
body:
Bahgtru, **Leg-Breaker**, brute strength and obedience.
- Patron of enforcers.
- Favors might over cunning.

title: Ilneval (God)
body:
Ilneval, **War Master**, strategy and command.
- Patron of lieutenants.
- Ambition on the march.

title: Luthic (God)
body:
Luthic, **Cave Mother**, endurance and fecundity.
- Patron of hearth-caves.
- Claws that heal and harm.

title: Shargaas (God)
body:
Shargaas, **Night Lord**, shadows and terror.
- Patron of assassins.
- Nighted dread.

title: Yurtrus (God)
body:
Yurtrus, **White Hand**, death and plague among orcs.
- Patron of shamans.
- Silent and shunned.

title: Maglubiyet (God)
body:
Maglubiyet, **High Chieftain**, ruler of goblinoid pantheon.
- Patron of conquest.
- Demands obedience.

title: Khurgorbaeyag (God)
body:
Khurgorbaeyag, **Taskmaster**, goblin slavery and control.
- Patron of overseers.
- Chains and whips.

title: Nomog-Geaya (God)
body:
Nomog-Geaya, **Iron Warrior**, hobgoblin discipline.
- Patron of legions.
- Law of the lash.

title: Bargrivyek (God)
body:
Bargrivyek, **Mediator**, hobgoblin order and ceasefires.
- Patron of diplomats.
- Peace for advantage.

title: Hruggek (God)
body:
Hruggek, **Bugbear Fury**, ambush and ferocity.
- Patron of raiders.
- Skulls for trophies.

title: Grankhul (God)
body:
Grankhul, **The Sneak**, bugbear stealth and cunning.
- Patron of scouts.
- Eyes in the dark.

title: Skiggaret (God)
body:
Skiggaret, **The Deranger**, bugbear panic and insanity.
- Patron of terror.
- Screams in the night.

title: Annam the All-Father (God)
body:
Annam, **All-Father**, creator of giantkind and the Ordning.
- Patron of legacy and might.
- Remote, world-shaping will.

title: Stronmaus (God)
body:
Stronmaus, **Storm Lord**, jovial cloud/storm giant deity.
- Patron of generosity.
- Thunderous mirth.

title: Hiatea (God)
body:
Hiatea, **Huntress and Hearthfire**, giantess of family and chase.
- Patron of growth and skill.
- Spear and flame.

title: Skoraeus Stonebones (God)
body:
Skoraeus Stonebones, **Silent Sage**, stone giant art and lore.
- Patron of sculptors.
- Stillness of stone.

title: Surtur (God)
body:
Surtur, **Lord of the Forge**, fire giant craft and conquest.
- Patron of smith-kings.
- Crown of flame.

title: Thrym (God)
body:
Thrym, **Ice Jarl**, frost giant ferocity and winter's crown.
- Patron of raids and glaciers.
- Evercold ambition.

title: Grolantor (God)
body:
Grolantor, **The Ruiner**, hill giant hunger and brute dominance.
- Patron of the biggest and hungriest.
- Bulging appetite.

title: Memnor (God)
body:
Memnor, **Golden Deceiver**, cloud giant pride and guile.
- Patron of schemers.
- Honeyed lies.

title: Horus-Re (God)
body:
Horus-Re, **Falcon of the Sun**, rulership and righteous war.
- Patron of pharaohs.
- Triumph of light.

title: Isis (God)
body:
Isis, **Lady of Enchantment**, magic, motherhood, and healing.
- Patron of protection.
- Wise and kind.

title: Osiris (God)
body:
Osiris, **Lord of Eternity**, death, rebirth, and judgement.
- Patron of afterlife rites.
- Green of renewal.

title: Set (God)
body:
Set, **Lord of the Red Lands**, deceit and desert storms.
- Patron of serpents.
- Treachery enthroned.

title: Thoth (God)
body:
Thoth, **Ibis of Wisdom**, knowledge and measured magic.
- Patron of scribes.
- Balance in thought.

title: Anhur (God)
body:
Anhur, **Champion of the Gods**, war and courage.
- Patron of soldiers.
- Lion's roar.

title: Nephthys (God)
body:
Nephthys, **Friend of the Dead**, protection and funerary care.
- Patron of mourners.
- Night's comfort.

title: Geb (God)
body:
Geb, **Earthshaker**, soil and fertility.
- Patron of farmers.
- Grounded bounty.

title: Hathor (God)
body:
Hathor, **Lady of Music**, love, joy, and festivity.
- Patron of art and dance.
- Golden embrace.

title: Bes (God)
body:
Bes, **Household Guardian**, joy and warding against evil.
- Patron of families and births.
- Fierce smile.

title: Gilgeam (God)
body:
Gilgeam, **God-King of Unther**, tyranny and martial rule.
- Patron of imperial pride.
- Iron diadem.

title: Tiamat (God)
body:
Tiamat, **Dragon Queen**, fivefold wrath and hoarded wealth.
- Patron of chromatic dragons.
- Dominion through fear.

title: Ramman (God)
body:
Ramman, **The Thunderer**, storms and reckless war.
- Patron of berserkers.
- Crash of thunder.

title: Ishtar (God)
body:
Ishtar, **Queen of Heaven**, love and just warfare.
- Patron of passion and valor.
- Star-crowned.

title: Nergal (God)
body:
Nergal, **Prince of Pestilence**, death and disease.
- Patron of funerary fires.
- Scorching doom.

title: Ubtao (God)
body:
Ubtao, **Father of Dinosaurs**, creator-patron of Chult.
- Patron of maze trials.
- Withdrawn but watchful.

title: Qotal (God)
body:
Qotal, **Feathered Serpent**, Maztican life and harmony.
- Patron of mercy and crops.
- Opposes Zaltec.

title: Zaltec (God)
body:
Zaltec, **Obsidian Hummingbird**, blood sacrifice and war.
- Patron of cruel rites.
- Dark sun of hunger.

title: Azul (God)
body:
Azul, **Rainbringer**, Maztican rains and water.
- Patron of wells and lakes.
- Thirst slaked.

title: Tezca (God)
body:
Tezca, **Burning Sun**, scorching light and trials.
- Patron of the noon blaze.
- Purging heat.

title: Bahamut (God)
body:
Bahamut, **Platinum Dragon**, justice and protection.
- Patron of metallic dragons and paladins.
- Mercy with majesty.

title: Kurtulmak (God)
body:
Kurtulmak, **Hoard-Hunter**, kobold trapcraft and spite.
- Patron of tunnels and traps.
- Bitter cunning.

title: Semuanya (God)
body:
Semuanya, **Cold Blood's Pulse**, survival and fecundity.
- Patron of lizardfolk.
- Practical endurance.

title: Sseth (God)
body:
Sseth (Merrshaulk), **Night Serpent**, yuan-ti dominion.
- Patron of coils and plots.
- Subtle venom.

title: Ilsensine (God)
body:
Ilsensine, **Brain of God**, illithid supremacy and psionics.
- Patron of elder brains.
- Cold intellect.

title: Great Mother (God)
body:
The Great Mother, **Eye of Nightmares**, beholder genesis and insanity.
- Patron of aberrant visions.
- Ever-spawning eyes.

title: Vaprak (God)
body:
Vaprak, **The Destroyer**, ogres and trolls.
- Patron of rampage.
- Flesh that rends.

title: Yeenoghu (Demon Lord)
body:
Yeenoghu, **Demon Lord of Gnolls**, worshiped as a deity by gnolls.
- Patron of ravening packs.
- Endless hunger.

title: Laduguer (God)
body:
Laduguer, **Exile Smith**, duergar toil and craft.
- Patron of grim industry.
- Bitter endurance.

title: Deep Duerra (God)
body:
Deep Duerra, **Queen of Conquest**, duergar psionics and domination.
- Patron of iron minds.
- Silent conquest.

title: Diirinka (God)
body:
Diirinka, **Mad Savant**, derro deceit and strange magic.
- Patron of deranged inspiration.
- Dangerous genius.

title: Diinkarazan (God)
body:
Diinkarazan, **The Lost**, derro madness and wandering.
- Patron of broken minds.
- Whispers without end.

title: Gwaeron Windstrom (God)
body:
Gwaeron Windstrom, **Master of Tracking**, ranger-lore and beasts.
- Patron of the North's paths.
- Scent on the wind.

title: Shiallia (God)
body:
Shiallia, **Dancer in the Glades**, fertility and forest joy.
- Patron of sprites and midwives.
- Laughter under leaves.
